## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Added

- [alpha] The `CogniteMigration` model deployed with the `cdf migrate
prepare` command has been extended to support creating `SourceSystem`
instances from the `source` property of asset-centric Assets, Files and
Events.

## templates

No changes.
